thread.section_title: Rover.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rover.com | rover.com | 2 of 140
thread.title: Kelly

author: Kelly
title: Kelly
text: I first heard about Rover through a friend of mine from back home that is actually a sitter on Rover. My husband and I were going to be going out of town for a work trip and needed someone to watch our pup while we were out of town. Rover was a great way to find a sitter! I love that the sitters go through background checks and that Rover handles the money so there's no discrepancies about what was paid and when. I also love that they encourage pet owners to visit with potential sitters before booking anything.
